oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of J.C. Napier, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of James Carroll "J.C." Napier, not dated. Napier was a prominent African American businessman, politician, lawyer, and civil rights leader from Nashville, Tennessee. He was the first African American president of the city council, and was instrumental in founding numerous civic institutions in the city that went on to benefit the African American business community, with special emphasis on education. Photographer unknown. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Napier, J.C., 1845-1940
Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
